text: Hey, Hayley.
Tuttle? You're a devil worshipper?
Oh, I summoned a demon or two in my day.
Wait, you've summoned demons?

Oh, yeah. I'm actually still pretty good 
friends with Beelzebub.
He owes me a casserole dish.
I want to summon a demon!

Thing is, only real devil worshipers can 
summon a demon,
or the consequences can be deadly.
Oh, I'm. I'm for real.

So how do I do it?
- Easy.

Everything you need is in
those scrolls over there.
Aw, this demon's a cutie pie.
And to summon you, I need...
Whoa! Virgin's blood?
Space jam!
Is that a tampon? Poser.
Everyone knows devil worshippers free bleed.
Tears of an innocent.
Got you dream!
Jeff! My mom thinks your hat is stupid.

I heard her say it.
- Ah!
Ah! Ah!
Oh. Slaughter a red fox?
I can't do that.
Hey, Hayley, you still down there being a poser?
Pops, you know that job I applied for?

I got it. So I gotta pack up
and move to another forest.
Wait, you can't leave me.

Haven't you heard? You're supposed to stick 
by your father in sickness and in health.
That's for married couples.
Marry me son.
Listen, pops, I'm moving out.

You see that? The dummy of
my loins is abandoning his father.
Uh-oh. I think I'm having a heart attack.
This is the big one, Elizabeth.
I'm coming to join you, honey.
Uh.

Well, I didn't slaughter it, 
but I am stepping on its tail.
This has gotta be good enough.
Aw!

It is I, Sinzooks. Archduke of 
inter-dimensional space hell.
- Space what now?
Space hell.

You know, Hell Raiser, 
Event Horizon, etc.
Who has summoned me?

Not me! I was trying to
summon this cute little-
I mean, I did summon you.
Me, the summoner.

Then you will face me in a challenge 
decided by your very first utterance.
Like in Ghostbusters.
Space jam?
So it shall be done.

I shall summon 
Looney Tunes on your behalf,
that we might face off in a space jam.
When the stars align under the darkest of skies.
Lit only by an impending blood moon.
It's on! Wait, is it a Thursday?
'Cause I got hot yoga on Thursday.

Should you lose,
I will drag Langley to space hell.
What? I gotta warn people.
I mean, yeah, I would.
